item.description: Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#0133; 02:12AM; SB 110 Fwy x Olympic Blvd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3LxldNW; #PicoUnion; Traffic collision involving LAPD vehicle with 1 person trapped. 3 patients total: 2 in critical condition. 1 in serious condition. Media Inquiries: LAPD (Incident #403) and CHP Central L.A. (Log #256); FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 E10 E203 E209 E210 E211 E9 EM1 HR3 RA11 RA20 RA209 RA3 RA9 T10 T11 T3 T9; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Agency Assist; INC#0929; 01:43PM; Vicinity of Berth 194 - Port of Los Angeles; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GN9XJt; #Wilmington; PRELIM: LAFD land and sea response to 10' skiff overturned in the water. LAFD crews discovered one person dead floating in the water nearby ( unknown age / gender / physical condition / attire / affiliation / circumstances ), and now have that one deceased person aboard an LAFD Fire Boat. An LAFD Dive Team has completed a search of the area and discovered no other victims. Media Inquiries: Port Police and Coroner.; FS 49; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 BT3 BT4 E112 E285 E49 RA38 T85; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Traffic Collision with Entrapment 02/12/2022 INC#1731

item.description: Update Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#1731; 10:30PM; 22000 W Dumetz Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3sGrfDj; #WoodlandHills; Solo sedan collided forcefully with a tree on the southwest corner of Dumetz Road and Topanga Canyon Boulevard, badly trapping two young adult female occupants, with a third young adult female found outside the vehicle on LAFD arrival. Teams of Firefighters and Firefighter/Paramedics worked swiftly and skillfully to extricate the trapped women and provide care. Two of the patients were taken to a regional trauma center in critical condition, while a third sadly proved beyond medical help and was determined dead at the scene. Closure of one or more lanes of roadway in the immediate area is anticipated until LAPD and Coroner operations are complete, unknown duration. Motorists, expect congestion and delay, avoid the immediate area and consider an alternate route. Detours are readily available. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #4402) and Coroner; FS 84; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E105 E293 E305 E84 E93 EM17 HR3 RA105 RA72 RA84 T105 T93 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#1731; 10:09PM; 22000 W Dumetz Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3sGrfDj; #Woodl1andHills; PRELIM: 3 patients total. One on sidewalk and two trapped in a vehicle.; FS 84; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E105 E305 E84 E93 EM17 HR3 RA105 RA84 T105; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Hiker Rescue; INC#1237; 04:41PM; South of Hogback Trail; MAP: https://bit.ly/3BhBZf6; #GriffithPark; LAFD ground and air response with Griffith Park Rangers to an exhausted and seriously ill adult female hiker stranded in steep terrain, south of the Hogback Trail. Ground crews have hiked to the patient's remote location, and are medically stabilizing her as a hovering LAFD rescue helicopter prepares to hoist her aboard for continued in-flight care by LAFD Flight Paramedics during direct transport to an area hospital.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 BC5 E235 E35 H1 H3 HA1 HA3 RA6 RH114 T35; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Hiker Rescue; INC#0564; 10:25AM; Charlie Turner Trail; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rMEKSI; #GriffithPark; LAFD ground and air response with Griffith Park Rangers to an adult female hiker with a severe ankle injury, on or near the Charlie Turner (aka Mt Hollywood) Trail. LAFD ground crews have hiked to the location and are medically stabilizing the patient. A hovering LAFD rescue helicopter is expected to soon hoist the patient for continued in-flight care during direct transport to an area hospital.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC11 BC5 E235 E250 E35 E52 EM11 H0C H0F RA52 RA56 RA829 RH114 RH214 T35 T50; CH7; 14; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Knockdown - #VermontFire Greater Alarm Structure Fire 02/12/2022 INC#0342

item.description: Knockdown - #VermontFire Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0342; 07:30AM; 761 S Vermont Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JnoZrb; #Koreatown; 89 LAFD Firefighters took just 36 minutes of well-coordinated offensive operations to access, confine and fully extinguish stubborn flames from an exterior fire that extended within one (yet to be identified) business in a 200' x 50' one-story strip mall. Firefighters skillfully prevented the flames from extending laterally, preventing fire damage to the other10+ businesses in the structure. The specific cause of the fire remains under investigation.; FS 13; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC1 BC11 BC18 CM22 E10 E11 E13 E15 E203 E210 E211 E226 E229 E29 E3 E6 EA1 EM11 HR3 RA29 RA3 RA803 RA813 SQ21 T10 T11 T26 T29 T3 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire #VermontFire 02/12/2022 INC#0342

item.description: Update #VermontFire Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0342; 07:25AM; 761 S Vermont Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JnoZrb; #Koreatown; With 89 LAFD personnel assigned, this stubborn fire involving at least one unit in a 200' x 50' one-story row of commercial businesses, has escalated to Greater Alarm status and is known as the #VermontFire.; FS 13; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC1 BC11 BC18 CM22 E10 E11 E13 E15 E203 E210 E211 E226 E229 E29 E3 E6 EA1 EM11 HR3 RA29 RA3 RA803 RA813 SQ21 T10 T11 T26 T29 T3 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

Traffic - Auto vs Ped; INC#0926; 01:12PM; 6400 N Van Nuys Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rLArHg; Van Nuys; Two car collision caused one vehicle to then strike a pedestrian. A total of three patients involved (all are adults): The pedestrian is a male, transported in critical condition. One female patient transported in serious condition and one male transported with non-life threatening injuries. Any further questions are directed to LAPD Inc# 2324. No further details.; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; E39 RA39 RA903 RA93 RA98; CH8; Margaret Stewart
